comparison.description: Determines how the current day time ticks of the world should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the current day time ticks of the world should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the current day time ticks of the world will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the current day time ticks of the world will be compared to.

type.description:
## Time Of Day

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/time_of_day)

Checks the current day time ticks of the world.

Type ID: `origins:time_of_day`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:and",
    "conditions": [
        {
            "type": "origins:time_of_day",
            "comparison": ">=",
            "compare_to": 12000
        },
        {
            "type": "origins:time_of_day",
            "comparison": "<=",
            "compare_to": 13000
        }
    ]
}
```

This example will check if it's the sun is currently setting.
